enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.fishi: Gives a chance to catch an additional items from fishing.
wonderful_enchantments.fanatic_level_up: You have become greater Fishing Fanatic!
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.human: Increases the damage against villagers, pillagers, witches and other players.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.dodge: Gives a chance to completely avoid any kind of damage.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.enlig: Increases the experience gained from any source.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.vital: Increases the health of the player.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.phoen: Fall from a height causes the release of a wave of fire which damages and sets nearby enemies on fire. Also while you hold the sneak key (def. SHIFT) you will jump higher!
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.puffe: Every attack will inflict on target several debuffs.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.immor: You will cheat death on fatal hit.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.smelt: Gives a chance to smelt a block on destroy.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.slown: Decreases the speed of the player's movement.
